branchCategory.name: 90-AF30-60, Modular Style, Air Filter
branchCategory.description: <p>Air Filter series AF is a modular style air filter which is cost effective, clean looking solution to your filtration  needs.  Its' modular design allows connection with other SMC air preparation equipment.  90-AF is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. The series is available in six size options with a wide range of accessories.</p>
